alert.note: Alert for Benton; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Benton and west central Linn Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Toddville, or 11 miles north of Cedar Rapids, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Shellsburg around 515 PM CDT. Urbana around 520 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 27 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
